## BorrowingOperationOptionalParams.maxBorrowingRate property

Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./arth-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) (default: current borrowing rate plus 0.5%).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish;
```
